text: I was the opposite. I would stay home for Christmas Eve and Christmas and enjoy the holiday I loved so much. I got to say playing this game during Christmas time back in the early 2000s as a kid was absolutely magical. Playing and walking in the snow then going outside to do it yourself and looking at your window from outside and seeing that beautiful Christmas tree you decorated standing tall.

text: Hard to find a more fitting VGM than this one on the 24th. I may not be a kid anymore, but that doesn't mean the Christmas magic is completely gone. It's always a greatï»¿ time for me with the family. It's especially easy to get into it when you live in a place like Canada with the warmth of our homes while it's cold outside, and with all the nice colorful decorations against the white snow.
